column5: Users can fully play DanceDanceRevolution in the following game modes: Solo, Group. Currently the Konami Leaderboard System along with the Twitter Board is defunct. Depending on your PC hardware, you might experience lag during the dance off session.
This game requires a ticket system to launch.
Leaderboards are not active during our alpha-internal test.
Dolphy Race initaties where users can bet on different dolphins to receive prizes. Futhermore, users can bet win rewards just by entering this public scene.
The Bomber Night Fever minigame plays original Bomberman music as intended.
The Survival Bomber minigame allows up to 8-players to play in the same lobby.
Users will be able to play in the following game modes: Solo & Group for both PS3/RPCS3.
MLA issues will arise for RPCS3 after users after quiting the game.
MLA issues will arise for RPCS3 after users after quiting the game.

Users can collect bacteria to cultivate new items and pets at Peakvox Labs.
Due to a non-implemented syscall function in RPCS3 #sys_net Syscalls, Web Browser functions will not work on RPCS3 for Home. As for PS3, the original webpage has not been archived.
All Stage Lights & Lasers functions are working as intended for both PS3/RPCS3.
All original music content has been implemented for the end-user.
MLA issues will arise for RPCS3 after users after quiting the game.
